description:
Cabinet screws are used to hold cabinets together. They are used alone, or in combination with machine screws. The heads of cabinet screws are easy to access and can be gripped by a screwdriver for tightening or loosening. They have a slot along the shaft so that they can be tightened securely with a screwdriver, unlike machine screws, where the head must be tightened with a wrench.

After setting your sights on a new cabinet, you know it needs to be assembled correctly. That's why we offer high-quality screws and cage nut sets that will suit just about any budget in our 24 hour turnaround time fixes the job fast.
name: Cabinet Accessories
